property.name: background
property.return: the border color of the bean
property.description: Sets or gets the background color of the Bean.
property.summary: Sets or gets the background color of the Bean.

property.name: beanVersion
property.return: the version of the bean; this should be in sync with the version of the plugin used
property.description: This is a readonly property which returns the bean version. The bean version indicates which version of the Servoy JasperReports plugin the bean should be used with.
property.summary: This is a readonly property which returns the bean version.

property.name: beanViewerExportFormats
property.return: the file save/export formats of the viewer
property.description: Gets or gets the file save/export formats of the Bean's viewer.
property.summary: Gets or gets the file save/export formats of the Bean's viewer.

property.name: border
property.description: Sets or gets the border type, width and color.
property.summary: Sets or gets the border type, width and color.

property.name: displayMode
property.return: the display mode of the viewer
property.description: Sets or gets the display mode of the viewer in the Bean.
property.summary: Sets or gets the display mode of the viewer in the Bean.

property.name: font
property.return: the font type used in the viewer
property.description: Sets or gets the font type of the Bean's viewer.
property.summary: Sets or gets the font type of the Bean's viewer.

property.name: foreground
property.description: Sets or gets the foreground color.
property.summary: Sets or gets the foreground color.

property.name: name
property.description: Gets or sets the name of the Bean.
property.summary: Gets or sets the name of the Bean.

property.name: relativeExtraDirectories
property.return: the relative path or paths to the client set extra directory/directories
property.description:
Get or set the relative path or comma separated paths to the extra resource directories of the Servoy JasperReports plugin. The paths are set per client and are relative to the server corresponding directories setting.
Please refer to the same property of the Servoy JasperReports plugin for more details.
property.summary: Get or set the relative path or comma separated paths to the extra resource directories of the Servoy JasperReports plugin.

property.name: relativeReportsDirectory
property.return: the location of the client set reports directory, relative to the server set path
property.description:
Property for retrieving and setting the path to the reports directory, set by the current client, relative to the server reports directory of the Servoy JasperReports plugin.
Please refer to the same property of the Servoy JasperReports plugin for more details.
property.summary: Property for retrieving and setting the path to the reports directory, set by the current client, relative to the server reports directory of the Servoy JasperReports plugin.

function.name: getHeight
function.description: Gets the height of the Bean.
function.summary: Gets the height of the Bean.

function.name: getLocationX
function.return: the x-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location
function.description: Gets the x-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location.
function.summary: Gets the x-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location.

function.name: getLocationY
function.return: the y-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location
function.description: Gets the y-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location.
function.summary: Gets the y-coordinate of the Bean's top-left corner location.

function.name: getWidth
function.description: Gets the width of the Bean.
function.summary: Gets the width of the Bean.

function.description: Sets the size of the Bean.
function.summary: Sets the size of the Bean.

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: the width of the bean

parameter.name: height
parameter.description: the height of the bean

function.name: showReport
function.description: Shows the indicated report in a JasperReports Viewer (in the Bean).
function.summary: Shows the indicated report in a JasperReports Viewer (in the Bean).

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: the datasource (the server name, foundset or dataset) to run the report on

parameter.name: report
parameter.description: the report file to export and preview (relative to the reports directory)

parameter.name: parameters
parameter.description: the map of parameters to be used when previewing the report

parameter.name: localeString
parameter.description: the string which specifies the locale

parameter.name: moveTableOfContent
parameter.description: true in order to move the table of contents, false otherwise

property.name: pluginVersion
property.description: Get the version of the Servoy JasperReports Plugin.
property.summary: Get the version of the Servoy JasperReports Plugin.

property.name: relativeExtraDirectories
property.return: the path to the extra directories relative to the server side set location
property.description:
Property for retrieving and setting the paths to the extra resources directories. The paths are set per client and are relative to the server corresponding directories setting.
By default the value is read from the Admin Page: Server Plugins - the directories.jasper.extra property. If the client modifies the default property, this value will be used instead of the default one for the whole client session and only for this client. Each client session has it's own extraDirectories value.
NOTE: Extra directories are not searched recursively.
property.summary: Property for retrieving and setting the paths to the extra resources directories.
property.sample: //setting the extra directories, relative to the server side location plugins.jasperPluginRMI.relativeExtraDirectories = "extraDir1,extraDir2";

property.name: relativeReportsDirectory
property.return: the location of the reports directory, relative to the server set path
property.description:
Property for retrieving and setting the path to the reports directory, set by the current client, relative to the server reports directory.
By default the value is read from the admin page Server Plugins, the directory.jasper.report property. If no value has been set in the admin page for the report directory, the default location will be set to /application_server/server/reports. A client is only able to set a path relative to the server report directory. If the client modifies this property, its value will be used instead of the default one, for the whole client session and only for this client. Each client session has it's own relativeReportDirectory value.
property.summary: Property for retrieving and setting the path to the reports directory, set by the current client, relative to the server reports directory.

property.name: reportDirectory
property.description:
Property for retrieving the reports directory from the server.
NOTE: Setting the absolute path for the report directory on the server is no longer supported.
property.summary: Property for retrieving the reports directory from the server.

property.name: viewerExportFormats
property.return: the list of desired export formats; the first one will be the default export format.
property.description: Property used in order to get or set the Jasper Viewer's export formats.
property.summary: Property used in order to get or set the Jasper Viewer's export formats.

property.name: viewerIconURL
property.description: Sets or gets the Jasper Viewer's icon URL.
property.summary: Sets or gets the Jasper Viewer's icon URL.

property.name: viewerTitle
property.description: Sets or gets the Jasper Viewer's title text.
property.summary: Sets or gets the Jasper Viewer's title text.

function.name: runReport
function.return: the generated reported as a byte array
function.description: This method runs a specified (client) report according to the output format, parameters and locale. If using a table of contents and if needed, the table of contents can be moved to a specified page. Please refer to the sample code for more details.
function.summary: This method runs a specified (client) report according to the output format, parameters and locale.

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: the server name or foundset to run the report on

parameter.name: report
parameter.description: the report file (relative to the reports directory)

parameter.name: arg
parameter.description: the output file (must specify an absolute path) or null if not needed

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: the output format; use the constants node for available output formats

parameter.name: parameters
parameter.description: a parameter map to be used when running the report

parameter.name: parameters
parameter.description: a parameter map to be used when running the report

parameter.name: localeString
parameter.description: the string which specifies the locale
